alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 06 at 7:30AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...PATCHY FREEZING FOG THIS MORNING BEFORE 10AM FOR ORANGE COUNTY NY... Some patchy freezing fog remains within Orange County. Temperatures are below freezing and some light ice accretion has been reported in Montgomery. This will cause for untreated surfaces to become slippery. In addition, some of this fog is dense with visibilities reduced down to one half to one quarter of a mile. Motorists should proceed with extra caution and drive carefully and slowly when encountering these conditions. Be prepared for drastic changes in visibility. Allow extra space between vehicles. Use low beam headlights.
